title: 18.2_Abstract_syntax trees
text:
library(rlang)
library(lobstr)

lobstr::ast(f(x, "y", 1))   # knitr complains about character

█─f 
├─x 
├─"y" 
└─1 

lobstr::ast(
    f(g(1, 2), h(3, 4, i()))
)

█─f 
├─█─g 
│ ├─1 
│ └─2 
└─█─h 
  ├─3 
  ├─4 
  └─█─i 

lobstr::ast(
    f(g(h(2)))
)

█─f 
└─█─g 
  └─█─h 
    └─2 

# 18.2.3 infix
x = 2
y <- x * 10

# as prefix
`<-`(y, `*`(x, 10))

lobstr::ast(
        `<-`(y, `*`(x, 10))
)

█─`<-` 
├─y 
└─█─`*` 
  ├─x 
  └─10
